name: 3D Thing
description: The picture is my actual build in Unity, which totally works in game mode, but for some reason it keeps exporting a much earlier version, no clue why. Unity has crashed more than a dozen times as I've been working on it, though, and every time I fiddle with it, more things go wrong. Hey, at least there's platforms to jump on, so I guess it technically works since the rest was just dressings to make it look cooler.
